quote: Alex the waiter was on my Spank Naughty list in third place, right after Henry Calvill the actor, then Henry Calvill as Superman. He was proof that God existed, and that God loved straight women.
quote_letters: ALEX THE WAITER WAS ON MY SPANK NAUGHTY LIST IN THIRD PLACE RIGHT AFTER HENRY CALVILL THE ACTOR THEN HENRY CALVILL AS SUPERMAN HE WAS PROOF THAT GOD EXISTED AND THAT GOD LOVED STRAIGHT WOMEN
